item.title: First words ex-cathedra
item.description: Jesús Malo (San Francisco, Starbucks at 390 Stockton St., February 2015) Circa 2015, applications for full professorship in Spanish universities (cathedra) involved writing an essay to describe your career and personal views on science. Here is what I wrote to get the condition of Accredited University Professor from the official National Evaluation Agency… Now (after the positive outcome in July 2015), I upload the version with uncensored pictures, full text, and over 150 hyperlinks!
